channel.title: economist on 避风港

item.description: China | A new Silicon Valley Behind Deepseek lies a dazzling Chinese university It models itself on Stanford, and is in the tech hotspot of Hangzhou A HUGE STATUE of Mao Zedong still stands near the entrance to Zhejiang University, surveying the transformation of the eastern city of Hangzhou,175km (110 miles) south-west of Shanghai. Such statues look anachronistic wherever they linger across China, but especially so here, and especially after

China | A new Silicon Valley Behind Deepseek lies a dazzling Chinese university It is not often that the world’s two superpowers hold state-of-the-nation addresses back-to-back. But thanks to a quirk of scheduling and the magic of time zones, it happened this week. Li Qiang, China’s prime minister, gave his annual report to the coun

China | China’s super-smart Tesla-killers Behind Deepseek lies a dazzling Chinese university Sitting in his spacious office in the southern city of Guangzhou, He Xiaopeng is in an expansive mood.
